content: The Dragon Thorn is an odd plant.
It can be found nearly anywhere in the world,
most often after the sighting of a dragon in the region.</br>
Once grown it survives off of dense concentrations of magic.
The Dragon Thorn has a flower at the tip of the stem that is deep purple in color.
The flower has short triangular leaves and is protected by three green thorny leaves
that stick out with nearly perfect symmetry.
The stem of the plant is decorated with leaves in similar patterns.
The flower smells different depending on how attuned to magic a person is,
this ranges from a sweet scent to wet grass.
